description: Evidence based practice is fundamental to the dietetics professional. This course draws together both theory and practice. Students will use a team-based approach to systematically evaluate the level of evidence that address a problem facing dietetics practitioners in practice. They will develop solutions based on evidence including the practicality and the soundness of the financial and management risk elements of the solution.
prerequisites: DIET7101, DIET7102, DIET7103, DIET7104, DIET7201, DIET7202, DIET7203, and DIET7204
